Guides.bio: Andrew has always loved the outdoors, and the first time he went rafting he fell in love. He loves the river and rush of the rapids.
Sam has been a guide on the Salmon since he was a teen. He grew up on the Salmon River, and knows it like the back of his hand.
Melony is a collage student majoring in Biology. Her summers have been filled with whitewater for as long as she can remember and she wouldn't want it any other way.
